body.name: iPhone Charger, LED Lightning Cable [Apple MFi Certified ] USB Charging/Sync Lightning Cord Compatible with iPhone SE 11 11 Pro 11 Pro Max Xs MAX XR X 8 7 6S, iPad and More (Blue, 3 FT)

features: ✔Light Up iPhone Charger -- The innovative LED light up iPhone charger cord makes charging more vivid. Especially in the dark, the lighting charging cable easily decorates your room, cool and unique, and also quickly find your devices. Fits most iPhone cases.

✔Durable Material -- Reinforced anti-breaking design, phone cable with 50,000+ times bend lifespan and integrated molding process, TPE jacket is super smooth and comfortable, more durable than standard iPhone charger cord.
✔MFi Certified Lightning Cable -- MFi Certified and built with smart chipset promise no warning message pops up, ensures that your devices are loaded and charge safely at maximum speed.

✔Quality Copper Wire -- Super four-core copper wires configuration technology promote maximum signal quality and strength and enhance charging & data transfer high speed with up to 2.4A and 480 mb/s transferring speed.
✔One Year Warranty -- 1x iPhone Charger Cord, friendly and reliable customer service 365 days. Perfect 3 feet, great for home, in car and office use.
body.description: Perfect Compatibility: - iPhone 13/12 /11 / Pro / MAX / Mini/ XR/ XS - iPhone X / 8 / 8 Plus - iPhone 7 / 7 Plus - iPhone 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plu - iPhone 5 / 5S / 5C / SE - iPad Pro/ iPad Air / iPad Air 2 - iPad mini / iPad mini 2 / iPad mini 3 / iPad mini 4 - iPod Touch 5th Gen / iPod Nano 7th Gen

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose our Apple Led Lightning Cable? ✔With an innovative streamer effect, the beautiful flowing light will move with the current, and you can quickly find your phone in the dark, bringing convenience and fun to your life! Add a nice atmosphere in different environments. ✔Durable, Tangled-free charger cable, reinforced iPhone charging cable, sturdy aluminum alloy connector, The soft and strong TPE shell, excellent resistance to damage, you can use it for a long time. ✔Built with Apple's upgarded terminal and smart chipset promise no warning message pops up. Each cable contains a unique, serial number and an authorization chip issued by the official agency to ensure 100% compatibility with any Lightning device. ✔2.4A Fast Charge and 480Mbps Fast Sync. High-Quality Copper Cord and upgraded 8 Pin connector, which improves the charging and data transmission speed of the iphone charging cable. ✔It is very durable, with a unique reinforced SR cable connector, which is not easy to break, and you can find your phone before going to bed.

Product Parameters: Material: TPE, Optical Fiber, Copper Wire, Aluminum Alloy Head Cable Length: 3FT Color: blue Bend Lifespan: 50000 times Charging Current: 2.4A Transmission Speed: 480Mb/s You will get: 1x box-pack LEUSB A to Lightning iPhone Charge Cable Perfect Compatibility: - iPhone 13/12 /11 / Pro / MAX / Mini/ XR/ XS - iPhone X / 8 / 8 Plus - iPhone 7 / 7 Plus - iPhone 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plu - iPhone 5 / 5S / 5C / SE - iPad Pro/ iPad Air / iPad Air 2 - iPad mini / iPad mini 2 / iPad mini 3 / iPad mini 4 - iPod Touch 5th Gen / iPod Nano 7th Gen

Beautiful Flowing Light Effect and Unique Design We use hard TPE materials, precision laser welding, aluminum alloy connectors, and the entire life cycle of charging can be obtained from a single cable. Especially in the dark, the lightning cable can easily decorate your space. It is both novel and cool. You can quickly find a charging mobile phone in the dark. Convenience and Freedom The perfect length of these charging cables allows you to charge anytime and anywhere in the car, which is very convenient and free. The led lighting iPhone cable is especially suitable for use in the car. When you drive at night, you can easily find the bright data cable. The light is beautiful and bright, and the brilliant light becomes a cool decoration on the car. Fast Charging & Data Transfer When you are working, These Led Lightning charge cables can make your phone fast charging and fast data information transmission, up to 2.4A. High-quality copper wire will give you ultra fast charging data up than normal cable, ensure that you and your devices are safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LED lighted IPhone charger cable
reviews.reviewText: Love the LED IPhone charger. When it’s plugged in it pulses the light all the way to the phone. Really cool. Seems pretty sturdy, cable itself is wrapped in a clear rubber plastic. Looks good in the dark driving!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lighted cable!
reviews.reviewText: This one seems to be sturdy cable after a month of heavy daily use. I use the lights as a nightlight plus it makes it’s difficult to accidentally leave your phone in the hotel.Yes, I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cool and perfect for a gaming PC setup!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband because he was always complaining that the cord he was charging with was too long and the cloth would fray. I decided to try this one out, because it's the perfect length for him to use at his computer desk. He has a gaming PC setup with the typical blue and red colors. This plugged into the PC and sits on his desk to charge his phone. He also uses it to transfer data from his phone to PC. The blue light compliments his setup and looks really cool and relaxing in the evening. 10/10 would buy another!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars smooth pulsing stops once charge is complete
reviews.reviewText: PROs:- Slow pulsing effect is nice and serene, it wont make you feel like your about to go into an epileptic seizure like those annoying frantically flashing 'flow' cables.- I bought Red since any other color is likely too bright for a bedroom and would be just as annoying. The red has the perfect retina-relief brightness and is non-obtrusive.- Pulse effect stops and returns to constant on as soon as charging is complete (same as when its plugged in but nothing is connected), so its easy to tell from a distance when your phone is fully charged- Cable is very sturdy with tight and durable fittings (no mismatches or catchy edges)- No problems with data transferCONs?- Fiber optic is good though brightness noticeably ebbs towards the far end, yes just a fact of light transfer but would adding a second LED at the end improve this?- The cable itself is kind of hard-plasticy, almost 'springy', and is a bit wider than it probably needs to be, i prefer something a bit rubbery and rounderIn SUM:- This is still the best cable ive bought anywhere yet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light up your life and your cable.
reviews.reviewText: Yes that is what it does! Glows in the dark.When I opened the box the cable appeared black.When I plugged it in and there it was, “a blue glowing cable. It is very durable much better than the light weight cords When plugged into the bigger adapter it charges much faster than the white cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool and Effective!
reviews.reviewText: It works great! It works as advertised and feels as sturdy as all the others I have used. Seems as good quality as the original cord. It's really cool looking and lights up. Very fast delivery! Thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love these. I have purchased about 5 so far as gifts. These are wonderful to have next to your bed since they light up. It makes finding your phone drunk g the night super easy. Seems very durable too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars doesnt work, wont connect to car
reviews.reviewText: doesn't work, won't connect to the car or charge. other brands work unfortunately this one doesn't.
